about_the_game:
Have you ever wondered what the life of a builder in ancient Rome was like? Did you ever wish to become a Roman architect and build the most famous building of antiquity? Now you have the opportunity. Choose the building you want to create and get to work.



In Rome Frontiers, you can take the role of a builder, supplier, craftsman, crane man, sculptor, who together work to build the most important architectural works of ancient Rome. You will be given the opportunity to choose the building elements of your choice as well as create decorations by yourself. In what time will you manage to build the building of your choice?



During the game, complete special quests, take care of the amount of resources you need. Manage supplies such as wood, stone, marble or animals. Without the right resources you won't be able to build anything. As you develop your characters you will have access to more and more interesting building elements. Will you create a more beautiful Colosseum than it was originally?



Are you ready to face the challenges as a builder of ancient Rome? Will you succeed in building amazing structures and become a legend in the world of Roman architecture? Test your skills and play Rome Froniers now.


Features
- craft elements needed for construction
- A large number of quests to help you finish the construction
- 5 characters to choose and character development system
- 15 authentic buildings from the ancient Roman period ready to build
- game from first person view
